content.rendered:
2017 has been an amazing year for Kubernetes, containers, and Codefresh.  We launched for general availability last January with on-demand environments and our DinD as a service pipelines. Now heading into 2018 we’re a whole Dev Ops platform. We’ve had hundreds of updates and releases but here are some of the highlights!

Want a personal tour? Schedule a demo with one of our Kubernetes expert today and learn how to accelerate software delivery in 2018.

Bonus video rundown of the best of 2017!

@graph.name: Dan Garfield
@graph.description: Dan is the Co-Founder and Chief Open Source Officer at Codefresh. His work in open source includes being an Argo Maintainer, and co-chair of the GitOps Working Group. As a technology leader with a background in full-stack engineering, evangelism, and communications, he led Codefresh's go-to-market strategy and now leads open source strategy. You can follow him at twitter.com/todaywasawesome
